llm.feedback: Add explicit magnitude ranges for each DXY move (e.g., +0.3‑0.5 % for the 2025‑09 → 12 up‑case, –200 bp to –100 bp for the 2025‑10 → 26 down‑case) and cite the source for the range (B1KYJ1GPU)(XTQIQRP5K); correct the 2025‑10 → 26 down line to “flattening of the 2‑yr/10‑yr spread erodes the real‑yield differential, pressuring DXY lower” and include the catalyst window (Sept 25 Fed meeting, early‑Aug CPI, flattening of spread <30 bp) with citations (7XH2DKEKV)(U21K4ALYQ)(97MD1FHW8); ensure every line contains a single sentence, maps to the canonical handle DXY with a clear sign, and lists a dated catalyst window; tighten the “What to watch” field to specific triggers (Fed minutes, tariff announcements, Ukrainian/Russian rhetoric for the 2025‑09 → 12 down case; flattening spread, Fed hike, CPI > 3 % for the 2025‑10 → 26 down case) with appropriate IDs; and provide a brief probability rationale tied to the cited catalysts (e.g., 70 % probability that the September 25 Fed cut and tariff truce persist).
